Posts.Content: cbear wrote: I was diagnosed with breast cancer a month ago but had problems with insurance and now my lumpectomy is set up for this Tuesday. Scared to death because surgeon isnt very bed side mannered to discuss anything really. But i finally got my pathology report back from biopsy only. It states IDC GRADE 2 (TUBULAR...3, NULEAR...2,MITOTIC...1 DCIS PRESENT(CRIBRIFORM,NUCLEAR GRADE1-2,NO NECROSIS VASCULAR SPACE INVASION....ABSENT MICROCALCIFICATIONS...PRESENT WITH DCIS PREDICTIVE FACTORS...ESTROGEN...85% INTERMEDIATE -STRONG INTENSITY PROGESTERONE...PLUS 95% STRONG INTENSITY HER-2....0 K167....HIGH 40% I have tried to look up everything possible on everything but cant seem to find out about the k167 score and what that means for sure with chemo. Thanks for any help here. I have been told its possibly stage 1 and no lympnodes looked abnormal but the surgeon wants to do a lumpectomy and a sentinal node. I am having alot of trouble with this decision of lumpectomy or taking both off. I am very small to the plastic surgeon and says that the radiation will leave me very unhappy in about a year. He wants to take the off with expanders. He also said breast cancer wont come back if i do that. That is not what i have read. Please someone help me with this big decision. What are my chances at 47 of it coming back? HELP

Posts.Content: Dec 8, 2012 06:04PM cbear wrote: Well just want you to know i had my lumpectomy last Wednesday and all went well. That medicine that gave me kept me alseep for 45 mnutes after surgery and they had to get me up. Then went home and slept from 1p.m. till 6p.m. I loved it since i had not slept in 2 days because of the fear of surgery. My Dr. was so nice that morning but went to see him Friday a week later and same old Dr. No bedside manner at all. Guess its the white coat in his office. He stated that with no radiation i had 50 percent it would come back. Then 10 percent benifit for radiation and 10 percent chemo. Is that all i get is 80 perecnt? Have not got the patholgy report in my hands because they have to mail it but he drew 2 little dots on a piece of paper for 2 nodes. He said he took out 2 only and radiation will sterilize the others. WHAT! He said because of nodes i am stage 2 but i have read you can still be stage 1 with nodes. Can anyone help me with that and the percentages of no reoccurance for radiation and chemo. And under the arm seems a bit more sore then any other day. Could this be because of the nodes gone?

Could not sleep at all. Now i am just numb. Went to counseling and they said it was estrogen and progesterone positive and her2 negative. Its a 1.5 cm tumer in left breast about 2 oclock. I have fought with insurance company for MRI but they have changed it 3 times now. Next appointment will be November 6th i hope. Can anyone tell me what the Mri will tell them they dont already know. And what treatments will be needed? I have looked up so many things on internet and my mind is mush now. And i have waited a week and a half now for the MRI. Will that make a difference? Scared to death to move.
